trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There were no other sightings in Boise on or around September 8th 2009
divs: sighting detailstwo star like objects observed to the east of boise at approximately the same height in the sky as jupiter. one object was as bright as jupiter. the other was dimmer. the objects moved together at the same speed slowly and for about 1 minute then both slowly faded away. i thought they were stars at first until i stopped my car. at that point i noticed they were moving. they were not aircraft\planes.i was driving home from south boise to east boise. i first noticed them when i looked up and saw a bright star where none should be. i then saw the dimmer object moving with it. i felt a little nervous at first but then thought it was pretty cool. i lost sight of the objects when they faded away. they both faded at the same time.
Summary: Two star like objects, one bright , one dim moving together at the same speed. Slowly faded away.
